revised_title: The Efficacy of Salt in Treating Rattlesnake Bites
tldr: The author shares two instances of successful treatment of rattlesnake bites using salt. In one case, sea salt was applied to the wound and a dressing of salt and burdock root was used. In the other case, fine sea salt was applied directly to the wound, and the patient also took a mixture of saffron, water, and white ash bark. Both patients recovered without further complications. This suggests that salt may be an effective treatment for rattlesnake bites.
